She went on to appear on Summer House spinoff Winter House for two seasons and began dating fellow Bravo star Craig Conover, from Southern Charm, in 2021.', 'Outside of the show, Berner and DeSorbo launched their podcast Giggly Squad, inspired by a phrase said by Cooke, 42, on Summer House, in October 2020. The duo released a book, How to Giggle: A Guide to Taking Life Less Seriously, in April.', "‚ÄúI've always wanted to be one of those girls that brings a book on vacation and just reads the whole thing. I'm never going to be her, and that's fine,‚Äù DeSorbo told PEOPLE. ‚ÄúAnd I think that's why we like How to Giggle, because you can truly pick it up at any point in the book, and read one chapter and then put it down and come back to it. We grew up with Cosmopolitan, those quizzes and the magazines, so we wanted it to feel like that.‚Äù", 'Just like on Summer House and her podcast, DeSorbo doesn‚Äôt hold anything back in the book.', "‚ÄúWhen I post to my Instagram Story, I forget that 400,000 people are going to look at it. When we're on the podcast, I don't think about the people listening,‚Äù DeSorbo said. ‚ÄúWhen I was writing the book, I forgot that they were reading it.‚Äù", "The Bravo star said she never thought of Summer House as a job. ‚ÄúThey're my real friends,‚Äù DeSorbo said.", 'Clifton Prescod/Bravo via Getty', 'As DeSorbo stated in season 9 of Summer House, she wants to make her career her priority at this point.', "‚ÄúIf any 32-year-old man said, ‚ÄòYou know what? Actually, I'm going to focus on my career for a couple more years.‚Äô The response would be, ‚ÄòHe's got a good head on his shoulders. He really knows what he's doing,‚Äô‚Äù DeSorbo said. ‚ÄúBut when it's a woman, they're like, ‚ÄòThat's scary.‚Äô I'm not standing on the side of, ‚ÄòI don't want children and I hate men. I never want to get married.‚Äô I want to get married. I want to have a baby. I can't wait for that part of my life, but I want to do it when I want to do it, and I want to do it with the person I want to do it with.‚Äù", "Never miss a story ‚Äî sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories.", 'Summer House is streaming now on Peacock.', 'Read the original article on People', 'Advertisement', 'Advertisement']

Title: Why Summer House Needs a Valley-Style Spinoff
Paragraphs: ["BY JENNIFER O'BRIEN", 'Rumors are that the Summer House cast will get one more summer in their shared rental out in Montauk. The beloved series has had a hell of a run, but even Peter Pan had to grow up at some point. But this is why the current cast needs to be given a The Valley-like spinoff of their own. Viewers still love the OGs and aren‚Äôt totally ready to see them disappear.  ', 'I don‚Äôt think most Bravo fans had faith that The Valley would do well. Many viewers were concerned it would be the hot mess express. But the series did great. Currently, Season 2 is showing the downfall of Jax Taylor and Brittany Cartwright‚Äôs marriage. As well as Nia Booko and Danny Booko trying to protect their relationship at all costs. So when I think of a spinoff for Summer House, I can‚Äôt help but think the network already has some great blueprints. ', 'The possible spinoff could showcase Amanda Batula and Kyle Cooke as the married couple. They would undoubtedly provide some pretty good arguments. And Kyle would eventually be the new Danny as he mutters, ‚ÄúSummer used to be fun, but now I have three under three.‚Äù Then you‚Äôd have the friend who, in this case, would be played by Carl Radke. Watching him try to launch Soft Bar would be a great storyline, especially since his backup plan if it fails is bankruptcy. ', 'I don‚Äôt know about you, but Summer House is modern-day Sex and the City. The women are working hard for their money and are bada*ss. You got your Carrie in Paige DeSorbo, who loves fashion and the city. Your Samantha is Lindsay Hubbard. Amanda is your Charlotte, as she wants traditional things out of life and comes off as a sensitive girl who has trouble finding her voice. And Miranda is perfectly embraced by Ciara Miller, who is tomboyish, smart, and sometimes cynical. My friends have always been huge fans of SATC, and I understand a bit more about why. The series showcased trials and tribulations that were relatable. And Summer House seems to be the weekend version of the popular HBO show, as it highlights what it is like to be a working professional in the Big Apple.   ', 'Nothing is off limits for this group. The women (and men) of Summer House talk openly about the sexcapades. Recently, fans watched as a threesome went down in the house. There are also bonding moments, like all the girls taking shots of Lindsay‚Äôs breast milk. It would be something to see the ladies on their day-to-day journey through the working week. I imagine they‚Äôd meet up at a rooftop bar and try to right the world.  ', 'Who knew Lindsay and Paige would walk out of the Summer House as best friends? In the early seasons, Paige had to write Lindsay off because she didn‚Äôt know how to be a good friend. But she evolved. Now Paige is obsessed with Lindsay, and their friendship has really blossomed. Both have also had fantastic storylines that could only lead to more. Over the last three seasons, fans have watched Lindsay go from dating Carl, to being engaged, to being dumped right before the walk down the aisle. But she has pulled herself up by her bootstraps and kept on going.', 'Meanwhile Paige has been working her butt off to achieve her dreams. She finally landed a podcast tour and shed about 180 pounds of dead weight in her relationship with Craig Conover. Summer House fans have watched as she dealt with anxiety attacks and being gaslit. Finally, she made the ultimate decision to cut Craig loose. As Season 9 winds down, fans are being given more insight into why the relationship didn‚Äôt work. Honestly, who wouldn‚Äôt want to see these two single in the city and running their boss b*tch empires.  ', 'Summer House is available to stream on Peacock and Hayu in the UK and Ireland.', 'TELL US ‚Äì WOULD YOU BE INTERESTED IN A SUMMER HOUSE SPINOFF?', 'Jennifer O\'Brien has been a fan of reality TV ever since Jessica Simpson asked, "Is this chicken or fish?" Jennifer\'s favorite shows consist of everything Bravo, including the \'Real Housewives\' franchises, \'Below Deck\' franchises, and \'Southern Charm.\' Without a doubt, Jennifer\'s passion for reality TV shines through as she often tries to get to the bottom of major plot lines like Vanderpump Rules\' "Scandoval."', 'SHARE ARTICLE', 'RealityTea is a property of Evolve Media Holdings, LLC. ¬© 2024 All Rights Reserved. | Affiliate Disclosure: Evolve Media Holdings, LLC, and its owned and operated subsidiaries may receive a small commission from the proceeds of any product(s) sold through affiliate and direct partner links.']

Title: Paige DeSorbo Leaving Summer House After 7 Seasons
Paragraphs:
["Summer House's Paige DeSorbo, who has been a fan favorite from seasons three to nine, revealed she's exiting the hit Bravo series in an emotional letter to fans on June 5.", 'Summer is about to get a little less fun.', "Paige DeSorbo announced she's leaving Summer House following the season nine reunion, which concluded June 4.", '‚ÄúI have a little life update for you: I‚Äôve made the decision not to return to Summer House," the Giggly Squad podcast cohost shared with fans on her Instagram Stories June 5. "Being part of this show has been one of the most rewarding chapters of my life ‚Äì the friendships, the drama, the giggles. All unforgettable."', 'Since joining the Bravo series during season three in 2019, Paige noted, "You‚Äôve seen me grow up over these last 7 summers. I‚Äôll always be grateful for the memories, the community, and the opportunities this wild ride has brought me."', 'However, the 32-year-old continued, "But like all good things (and some bad decisions), it‚Äôs time for this chapter to close. To my castmates, the fans, and my NBCU family: thank you. I never could‚Äôve imagined what this journey would turn into ‚Äì and how many of you would be along for the ride."', 'That ride is just getting started, too.', '"And you haven‚Äôt seen the last of me, I promise," Paige‚Äîwho split from boyfriend Craig Conover in November‚Äîconcluded her message. "So much more to do together, but for now you know you can always find me and Daphne in my bed.‚Äù', 'Back in April, Paige weighed in on her Summer House future as her career offscreen continues to skyrocket.', '"There‚Äôs an end date for me at some point," she told Glamour in an interview published April 17. "With the lifestyle of Summer House specifically, I‚Äôm probably not fitting into the original show idea anymore. Whenever I see a comment that‚Äôs like, 'She‚Äôs a little too old to be on this,' I‚Äôm like, 'Yeah, I kind of am.'"', "Plus, she's more focused on work than play these days.", '"I‚Äôm probably not as fun to party with as a 25-year-old, and I get that," she added. "I would stay on reality TV, but it‚Äôs only fun and real if it‚Äôs your lifestyle, and as I get older, I am straying away more and more from partying every weekend."', '"I really can‚Äôt drink two nights in a row; I will pass away," the New York native jokingly added. "I was actually nervous for this season to come out because I felt like I didn‚Äôt do anything this summer because I was so tired from working."', 'Paige also addressed rumors that a move to The Real Housewives ofNew York City might be her next move.', '"Housewives is such an established franchise, I think it would be very hard for me to assimilate," she confessed. "I would never say never, but it‚Äôs not something I‚Äôm working toward."', 'Keep reading to see more stars who left hit TV shows.', 'Pedro Pascal, The Last of Us', "While fans maybe should have been aware that the days were numbered for Pedro Pascal's Joel Miller, considering his April 2025 death was quite similar to how it unfolded in The Last of Us Part II, the 2020 video game season two of The Last of Us is based on, the moment his character was brutally impaled still stunned. ", 'Pascal, meanwhile, who also died onscreen in Game of Thrones and Buffy the Vampire Slayer, took his game over status in stride. "I get killed a lot," he joked to Entertainment Weekly. "I like to die." His story arc honors them.‚Äù', 'Killing off the somewhat tormented, but beloved, firefighter was certainly a hot topic, showrunner Tim Minear acknowledged to Variety, "but after eight years, it just felt like, if we have any hope of creating stories going forward that have actual stakes, then someone's got to die."', "Ahead of The Sex Lives of College Girls' third season, Rene√© Rapp announced she would be leaving the Max series. ", '"College Girls moved me out to LA and introduced me to some of my favorite people," she wrote on social media in July 2023. "2 and a half years later‚Äîit's given me y'all and this community."', 'The show's co-creator Mindy Kaling also confirmed Rapp's exit. "We love @reneerapp so much and of course will be so sad to say goodbye to Leighton Murray!" Kaling wrote on her Instagram Stories before referencing Rapp's thriving music career. "We can't wait to see our friend on tour!!"', 'Kevin Costner, Yellowstone', "More than a year after Kevin Costner was rumored to have unexpectedly walked away from the hit Paramount drama after four and a half seasons, he confirmed in June 2024 that he will not return to finish out the series' fifth and final season.", 'After 19 years as Meredith Grey, Ellen Pompeo scrubbed in for the last time as a series regular on the ABC drama in February 2023. ', '"I gotta mix it up a little bit," Pompeo explained on The Drew Barrymore Show in December 2022, though she has already returned for a May guest appearance and continues narrating the series. You can't do The New York Times crossword puzzle every single day."', 'Batman vs. Superman star Henry Cavill revealed he would be stepping away from the Netflix fantasy drama after its third season‚Äîwith the announcement that Liam Hemsworth will assume the role of Geralt for season four, and potentially beyond.', '"My journey as Geralt of Rivia has been filled with both monsters and adventures," Cavill wrote on Instagram in October 2022. "Alas, I will be laying down my medallion and my swords for Season 4."', 'Original castmember Jesse Lee Soffer turned in his badge in 2022, saying goodbye to his beloved character Detective Jay Halstead role after 10 seasons.', '"To create this hour drama week after week has been a labor of love by everyone who touches the show," Soffer said in a statement after his final appearance in the NBC procedural's Oct. 5 episode. Jay Halstead."', "After five seasons, Damian Lewis departed Showtime's Billions in Oct. 2021.", "In Aug. 2021, it was reported that Emily VanCamp hung up her stethoscope for good as she had exited Fox's The Resident.", 'Madeleine Mantock, Charmed', 'After three seasons of feeling Charmed, Madeleine Mantock, who played eldest sister Macy on the CW reboot, announced her exit ahead of season four in 2021. Kate Kane) in the CW drama‚Äîmaking history as the first lesbian superhero to headline their own show, as Batwoman came out of the closet in a major TV moment‚Äîbefore announcing her exit just two days after the season one finale aired in 2020. The role was eventually replaced with Javicia Leslie as Ryan Wilder, a new character set to take control of the Batcave in season two. ", 'Later on in season two, Kate got a bit of a face swap and returned played by Wallis Day.', 'America Ferrera decided to exit Superstore at the end of season five in 2020, leaving Cloud 9 without a manager and the show without a lead. ', "In the 2019 season four finale of the Syfy series, Jason Ralph's character Quentin completed his quest to save Eliot (Hale Appleman), but sacrificed himself in the process. While the show does feature dead characters‚Äîit's called The Magicians after all‚ÄîRalph did not return for the fifth and final season.", "Ahead of the final season, Arrow's Emily Bett Rickards announced her exit in a poem of sorts.", '"Felicity and I
are a very tight two
But after one through seven
we will be saying goodbye to you," she wrote.', "She did, however, return for a guest appearance in the show's 2020 series finale.", "Lauren Cohan said see you later to The Walking Dead in 2018 following prolonged contract negotiations. "I'm going to be quitting the show in December after we finish the initial 13, so I really don't know what they're planning, but that's what I'm planning," he said in October 2018.
